attributes.additional_details: This e-partian is to request the government to imput more money and also, more forms of security in our local communities in london where there is mass fear or walking out your home without being a victim of gang crime or being mugged. Our MET. have a metal detecting scheame where they have portable metal detectors which members of the public are asked to step or walk through, it enstrikes fear into those who carry knives as they feel they are obligated to walk through and they are likely to stash or throw away  the knife. If this procedure is more established the ammount of muggings via knives and guns will be decreased as well as knife and gun related incidents.
